I work for a company that distributes manufactures and distributes DVD's for Warner Bros. , HBO, BBC, etc. It is very possible to acquire (steal) these products weeks and sometimes months before they are released. Trust me, happens all the time despite our security. It simply can't be stopped. So it is always possible to get a DVD rip well before it is released, I promise. I would never dream of doing it, I like my job. But it happens. They have caught guys taking them out stuck between two slices of bread and a piece of bologna. But they do get out.
